about_the_game:
Ancient is a third person exploration action-adventure game with shooting mechanics.


Play as Echo, a troubled girl, born with magical abilities, trying to find answers to her past after an experiment gone wrong stripped her of all memories.

After attempting to go back in time to find answers, the portal malfunctioned sending her back to 100 years after the collapse of the old civilization, the Panthynos. Now you must work your way back to the portal to get back to the present and find answers to your past.


Play the game however you like with all of the following planned features for 1.0 release!
--Doom Tower (Scale 100 floors in the Doom Tower, facing familiar enemies as it gets progressively more difficult.)
--Single player Campaign (A complete story that takes the player through many missions, facing challenging enemies and forging alliances. Discover lost ancient abilities, uncover your past and make your way home.)
--Modding Tools (A modding toolkit that allows for the creation, distribution, installation, and loading of mods allowing you, the player to build and design custom maps, stories, tools, basically anything. It's only limited by your creativity!)*
--Full Linux Support**

*Modding tools are not available at launch and will be released to all owners of the game once released.
**Linux is not currently supported, however, it is planned to be supported sometime before 1.0, likely early in release.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Any 12-Core CPU at 3.4GH or above
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD RX Vega 64
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements can, and likely will change throughout the process of development. Internal SSDs are recommended for best performance.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Any 12-Core CPU at 3.4GH or above
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 / AMD Radeon 5700 XT
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements can, and likely will change throughout the process of development. Internal SSDs are recommended for best performance.
